topics.name: Real Analysis
topics.quote: Mathematical analysis, in the study of all phenomena, interprets them by the same language, as if to attest the unity and simplicity of the plan of the universe, and to make still more evident that unchangeable order which presides over all natural causes.
topics.author: Joesph Fourier

topics.name: Linear Algebra
topics.quote: There is hardly any theory which is more elementary [than linear algebra], in spite of the fact that generations of professors and textbook writers have obscured its simplicity by preposterous calculations with matrices.
topics.author: Jean Dieudonn√©

topics.name: Abstract Algebra
topics.quote: Algebra is the offer made by the devil to the mathematician... All you need to do, is give me your soul: give up geometry
topics.author: Michael Atiyah
